name: Beyond Death (Luski Game Studio)
description:
'Beyond Death' is a soulslike game inspired by 'The Seventh Seal' (Ingmar Bergman, 1957) where you play as Greta, a woman who lived in middle-age Sweden and was killed during the holy inquisition. When she wakes up confused and lost, the woman goes on an exciting journey as she seeks to understand her past and the redemption of her soul.

Venture into an obscure setting, engage in combat with spectral enemies and seek the redemption of Greta's soul while discovering more about her life during conversations with an illustrious and dark figure: Death itself.

 

Follow us at facebook and instagram! You can also join our discord server here.

Game language options: English and Portuguese (Brazilian).

For now, Beyond Death has English translation only on game menus. However, we encourage you to try the game and its mechanics as we work to bring the narrative to English speakers as well.
